trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK117_04567_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is looking to distribute delicacies.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK117_04567_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the freshwater weeds to Maru.

TEXT_BANARK117_04567_MARU_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Have you ever gazed into a hippo's big, dark eyes and known in your heart there ain't nothin' cuter in this whole wide world? I sure have...
TEXT_BANARK117_04567_MARU_000_002<tab>Makes me wanna give 'em all their favorite treats─fruit, veggies, alfalfa...
TEXT_BANARK117_04567_MARU_000_003<tab>An' freshwater weeds! Those are so popular among our 'pots, I can never seem to pick enough...

TEXT_BANARK117_04567_MARU_000_004<tab>I feel a freshwater feast comin' on, so could you wrangle us some weeds? You can find 'em sproutin' from the banks of Ksiroda, just east of Yedlihmad. Three bundles would make me─and our sweet hippos─forever grateful!
TEXT_BANARK117_04567_MARU_000_021<tab>And we feast tonight! We used to save these for special occasions since they only grow in southern Thavnair, but I guess movin' down here has its perks.

TEXT_BANARK117_04567_MARU_000_022<tab>Still─the waters of Ksiroda flow from Vanaspati, you know? So in a way, it's like our old home is still takin' care of us. ...That's what I like to think, anyway.
